meanings.definition: A systemic insecticide used to control a wide range of insects on crops.
meanings.sent1: Farmers sprayed dimethoate on their fields to protect their crops from bugs.
meanings.sent2: The dimethoate effectively eliminated the pests infesting the tomato plants.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous insects avoided the dimethoate-treated area, opting for a bug-free zone.
meanings.sent4: The dimethoate worked like a shield, guarding the crops from the tiny invaders.
meanings.sent5: The powerful dimethoate acted as a guardian, keeping the fields safe from harmful insects.

meanings.definition: To apply dimethoate to crops for pest control.
meanings.sent1: Farmers dimethoate their fields regularly to keep pests at bay.
meanings.sent2: It is essential to dimethoate the crops before the insects cause damage.
meanings.sent3: The farmers dimethoated the fields with precision, ensuring thorough coverage.
meanings.sent4: Dimethoating the plants was like giving them a protective shield against bugs.
meanings.sent5: The act of dimethoating the crops was crucial for a successful harvest.

meanings.definition: The dimethoate residue on the produce was within safe levels.
meanings.sent1: The lab results confirmed that the dimethoate levels on the fruits were safe.
meanings.sent2: Inspectors found no harmful traces of dimethoate on the harvested vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The dimethoate residue on the apples was so low that it posed no risk.
meanings.sent4: The dimethoate residue on the crops was like a faint whisper, barely detectable.
meanings.sent5: Consumers were reassured by the negligible dimethoate residue on the fresh produce.
